item.title: 2012 Runescape mods
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“zerak93, post:20, topic:428026”]Lmfao… Why are you saying that they have alot of people after them ???

Only 1-3 was following them… And they had private offline.

And also, why are they walking around? That’s what I am saying.
Is it because it was a free world?
Is it because they want some fun?
Well, how can you have fun with some emotes that your company has build for some ages ago? -.-[/quote]
You fucking kidding me? Maybe he likes the emote? Maybe he enjoys the newer animations on it? You question why the mod walks around when you’re the dick that’s GE standing.

Read full topic

item.title: 2012 Runescape mods
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Didn’t bother reading all the posts in this thread so I’m not sure if someone has mentioned it…

Mod Weaths sole job at the moment is muting/locking the gold selling adverts. He’s doing his job, would you like people following you asking questions while you were trying to make a living? I wouldn’t…

There are mods whose job it is to talk to players in game and on the forums, if you find one of them in game I’m sure they’ll answer your questions.

Read full topic

item.title: 2012 Runescape mods
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Has anyone thought that maybe they where told to put their public/private chat off? I’ve seen some about looking for bots and they won’t reply even if you follow them for half an hour. It’s their job…

Read full topic

item.title: 2012 Runescape mods
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:24, topic:428026”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=530719.msg3877412#msg3877412 date=1325778000]

Can’t tell if op is trolling or just stupid

If they weren’t ment to help a player ingame then why have the crown showing ingame? I mean you’ve no way of contacting a normal Mod or Admin if you need help other then Report or through email, they should really have an ingame ticket maker so you can TALK to the Mods and Admins. What is the use of them being marked to help if they’re just going to sit around, they need to pull their heads out of their arses and get a move on. I know if i was the owner of a big company like jagex i wouldn’t want to pay people to stand around and relieve some stress on my time.

Pretty sure the mods don’t get paid, and jagex isn’t really going to care if the jmods don’t talk to in-game players as long as they do their jobs right. The ticket thing would be nice but I think it would get abused too much to be of any use

It was an expression, of course they don’t get paid becasue anyone can become an ingame mod. I just think they were made a Mod for a reason and that was because they helped people so jagex made them a game mod.
[/quote]

Or they were recommended by other Player Moderators (partly how I got Player Moderator status).[/quote]
But you were recommended for a reason, they aren’t going to recommend you for picking on people all day long.

Read full topic
